channel.title: Wordlist on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Wordlist on TLDRBins

item.title: Custom Word List Generator
item.description: CeWL username-anarchy spraygen cook # Create custom wordlist by spidering target cewl <TARGET> -w wordlist.txt --with-numbers Ref: CeWL # Create username wordlist ./username-anarchy -i <USERS> | tee <USERS_FILE> $ username-anarchy -i users.txt | tee usernames.txt james jamesroberts james.roberts jamesrob jamerobe ---[SNIP]--- Ref: username-anarchy python3 spraygen.py --year_start <YEAR_START> --year_end <YEAR_END> --type <TYPE> -o wordlist.txt $ python3 spraygen.py --year_start 2020 --year_end 2025 --type seasons -o wordlist.txt ( \_ _ ( \_ ( \_ ( \_ ( \_ ___ ( Password \ | | ( Spray |คคคคคคคค|___| ( _ / | ( _ / /~~~~~~~~~\ ( _ / ( Spray ) (_/ | This | | | | Get | | Creds | |_________| Original Art by Alex Chudnovsky (Unaffiliated) Spraygen tool by 3ndG4me Version 1.

item.title: Password Cracking
item.description: Convert File to Hash Format # For example ssh2john id_rsa_encrypted > hash keepass2john test.kdbx > hash zip2john test.zip > hash # Get a full list of *2john find / -name *2john 2>/dev/null john hashcat # General use john --wordlist=/usr/share/wordlists/rockyou.txt hash # Specify hash format john --wordlist=/usr/share/wordlists/rockyou.txt hash --format=Raw-SHA512 # Show cracked hash john --show hash # Show cracked hash with specific format john --show hash --format=Raw-SHA512 # Auto detect hash format hashcat hash # Specify hash format hashcat -m <MODE> -a 0 hash /usr/share/wordlists/rockyou.
